name: Dungeon Heroes
description:
Embark on an adventure alone or with friends into the ever-changing dungeon filled with monsters and treasure! With a cast of unique heroes to choose from, you have one life to navigate the hostile corridors and rooms. Can you reach the furthest depths and defeat the entity that awaits you? Those up to the challenge will be greatly rewarded!

A university project game developed by a team of nine over a period of five months.
